QuestData.Title: Things Left Behind
QuestData.Description:
The invading aqir forced the Wastewanders to flee many of our settlements in Uldum. In our haste to escape, much was left behind.
I understand you intend to take the fight to the beasts. While you're there, could you keep an eye out for any of the supplies we had to leave behind?
You can keep anything of use to you, of course.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Wastewander Supplies from Infested Caches in Uldum.
